setDetails.setDescription:
Zer0range is a digital asset index designed to track underlying assetâ€™s performance within the Crypto industry. Zer0range Index takes the best and most liquid DeFi, NFT and Blockchain assets available on the Polygon network and encompasses them into one investable asset, ZER0.

Objective: We aim to track projects majorly in Decentralized Finance, NFTs and standard Blockchain networks that have significant usage and upside with a team committed to growth and development.

Index Maintenance:
Zer0range Index is maintained every month. Addition and removal of any underlying assets will be made based on the research
setDetails.managerDescription: Zer0range is a team of two investors who prioritise research, fundamentals and the team behind each project which exhibits huge upside potential at the moment as well as in the coming future. We recommend making investments for the long term since Blockchain, DeFi and Metaverse are still in the nascent phase of infrastructure development, once they mature the investments that were made over a while also compounds equally. Social handles will be updated as early as possible. Stay tuned.
